mapper.select:
select * from DEMOTABLE where 1=1
and COL1 like '%'||#{col1}||'%'
and COL2 like '%${col2}%'
select distinct PROCESS_NAME from FIXBPA_FLOW_PROCESSDEFINITION where PROCESS_KEY= #{procKey}
select node_name from FIXBPA_FLOW_NODE where processdefinition_key = #{procKey} and processdefinition_id=#{procID} and node_id = #{nodeID}
